title: Combat Magic Sounds - Volume II
description: Make your magic come to life!
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


I'm proud to present you this pack with 347 sounds for you to use in Magic situations. There's alot of elemental stuff and the layers of each sounds, so you'll can do thousands of possibilities!


Check the preview

Check the documentation


Introduction

This bundle is all about combat magic for RPG'S and Adventure Games, you can find all the elements here, Water, Thunder, Ice, and fire, also, you'll find Dark and Heal Magic, that you can use for any numbers of situations. I'm pretty confident that this package is extremely useful for your game if you have some magic in it!


Variety

Besides all the sounds you'll also have the layer of the sounds itself, wich leads to thousand of possibilities in each folder, let's say you like the magical layer of an ice cast spell, but you don't want you use it for ice, you have just the magical layer isolated! So you'll have alot more sounds to use.


Quality

All the sounds were professionally recorded by me with a professional microphone, or created via Synth/Vsti. So you can use it without any fear for the quality of the samples.


Helping Each Other

If you decide to invest in this package you'll make my day and you'll have alot of good, original, and high quality sound effects, so the community can keep going!


Support

I'm pretty much online all the time, you can reach me via email if you need anything!
technicalDetails:

Supported Development Platforms:

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Documentation: Link (or a description of where users can find) the documentation

Important/Additional Notes: All the sounds are recorded and edited by me, and the cover is from Night Cafe, allowed to user commercialy by their faq.
